project.title: Shairi Badalna
project.blurb: Video file sorting & tagging system: fingerprint, enrich, simulate moves, and export plans.
project.description: Shairi Badalna organizes video libraries with deterministic rules. It computes file hashes for deduplication, extracts technical metadata, supports custom tags/collections, simulates target paths with dry-run safety, and exports CSV/JSON plans for batch execution via CLI. Designed for archivists and post teams working at scale.

versions.notes: Browser demo workspace with hashing, rules engine, simulation, CSV export.
Initial planning model with rule tokens and dry-run path generation.
